Articles.Content:
The soundtrack is marvelous. When you have tried and failed many, many times on getting your spaceship off the ground and in to space (safely or not, dosent matter), and you finally go into a stable orbit; The soundtrack you hear is just pure awesomeness. It means that you have finally done it. You made it into space, which is generally really cool.

So to whoever designed and created this masterpiece of music; Thank you

- Roger
Kevin Macleod. We have a lot more than just the KSP soundtrack to thank him for.
Just in case you want to appreciate the KSP soundtrack outside the game,
Nice thank you. I'll listen to this while im in space havin' a little flyby.
